metadata.title: CVE-2020-10941 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Arm Mbed TLS before 2.16.5 allows attackers to obtain sensitive information(an RSA private key) by measuring cache usage during an import.

criterions.comment: mbedtls: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
